title: Love Show
description: Hadley Arrington is the career-driven Editor-in-Chief of her university’s prestigious newspaper. Jack Diamond is a laid back student whose good looks have made things even easier than they need to be. She’s the girl who came out of nowhere and kissed him in the rain. He’s the boy who made her do something crazy.  When the stakes seem too high, they have to decide if they’ll let their love show or if they’ll walk away for good.
author: Audrey   Bell
